name: Kawaiirus-REX
description:
Yuppieee! You are here, special edition dakemokuro with diplodoc!
Awww, you’re mega cute, mister!
Yaaawn, you’re for sure sleeping by my side forever now.
Goodnight mister diplodoc! z-z-z-z

Earthquake.wav

“Attention! Dinosaurios have been spotted on the streets, stay in your apartments, until further notice!”
“ we hear screams of people, (man eatan by alligators)”
!!!

WOOOOOOOOOHOOOOOOO!!!
door opens
!!
Roar
on the road in front you see t-rex
Roar
t-rex jumps at you
black screen, kawaii sound, we see a kawaii dino, game starts
I finally got it, special edition of dakemokuro with diplodoc
He falls asleep, he wakeups hearing dinosaurs roar
Dinos appeared to this world yet again, due to failed experiment of foreign scientists
“ we hear screams of people, (man eatan by alligators)”

But our character is in katarsis - WOOOOOOOOOHOOOOOOO, he screams

he grabs his magic wand and goes to the streets, swinging left and right, he encounters Veloceraptor, and now he understands, that it’s a scary, carnivorous creature that have only 1 business with him - dinner. Dino jumps, he tries to protect himself, swinging with his wand. we hear kawaii sound, puff, he opens his eyes and sees kawaii dino, game starts.
